properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM( SELECT QNA_NO FROM qna where q_sort=1 and q_mem_no=? AND QNA_STATUS='Y' )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM(select QNA_NO , Q_MEM_NO , mem_name , Q_CATEGORY , Q_TITLE , Q_CREATE_DATE from qna join member on(q_mem_no = mem_no) where q_sort=1 and q_mem_no=? AND QNA_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY Q_CREATE_DATE DESC) B ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
select QNA_NO , Q_MEM_NO , Q_CATEGORY , MEM_NAME , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , A_CONTENT , A_CREATE_DATE from qna JOIN MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = Q_MEM_NO) where qna_no=? AND QNA_STATUS='Y' and Q_MEM_NO=?
